name: Strange Investigations: Secrets can be Deadly Collector's Edition
name_original: Strange Investigations: Secrets can be Deadly Collector's Edition
description:
Elephant Games, the studio that brought you the groundbreaking Strange Investigations: Two for Solitaire presents the anticipated sequel, Strange Investigations: Secrets Can be Deadly!

Renowned investigator Dana and her partner Malcolm barely have a chance to relax after their last adventure when a new and mystifying case is thrust upon them! What starts with an unprovoked attack at Dana's friend's apartment turns out to be a legendary story of betrayal, murder, and revenge. Join Dana as she struggles to find the truth about terrible events of the past and present in this mind-bending Hidden-Object Puzzle game!

This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won't find in the standard version.

This is a Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game, meaning a specific genre of story-driven, point & click adventures. Throughout the game, players are tasked to find a list of objects hidden within a particular scene, and to occasionally complete various mini-games/puzzles.

The Collector's Edition includes:

• Exclusive wallpapers and music to enjoy!
• Never get lost with the official strategy guide!
• Solve the mystery of the stolen museum artifacts in the bonus game!
• Master and replay your favorite hidden-object scenes to earn achievements!
• Tons of collectibles and puzzle pieces to find!
